title: QA Code Generator App - QACODE
description: This challenge is a great to practice working with external library. The challenge is to create a simple QA quote generator application that requires you to use external library.

userStories.content: Create a QA code generator app that matches the given design.
Use HTML to create the basic structure.
Add inputs, buttons,.. according to the design.
Users should be able to enter an url.
User should be able to see an QA quote after selecting QR code button.
User should be able to download QA quote image by selecting download button.
User should be able to copy URL link to clipboard by selecting Share button.
The page should be responsive on different screen sizes.
